meanings.definition: A material that can conduct electricity without resistance when cooled to a certain temperature.
meanings.sent1: The superconductor allowed electricity to flow without any obstacles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying superconductors to improve energy efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The superconductor decided to take a break from conducting electricity and went on a vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a superconductor, effortlessly transmitting ideas to others.
meanings.sent5: The superconductor was like a magical bridge for electricity, guiding it smoothly.

meanings.sent1: The lab tested the superconductor for its unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Superconductors have revolutionized various technological fields.
meanings.sent3: The superconductor threw a party to celebrate its amazing abilities.
meanings.sent4: His words were a superconductor of emotions, connecting with everyone deeply.
meanings.sent5: The superconductor glowed with the power of endless possibilities.
